text: This was an 8-week, multisite, randomized, double-blind, and placebo-controlled parallel group study. After screening, subjects who met enrollment criteria returned for the baseline assessment and were randomized 1:1 within site to guanfacine or placebo using permuted blocks with allocation concealed to investigators.
sentences: This was an 8-week, multisite, randomized, double-blind, and placebo-controlled parallel group study.

After screening, subjects who met enrollment criteria returned for the baseline assessment and were randomized 1:1 within site to guanfacine or placebo using permuted blocks with allocation concealed to investigators.
